nodes.text: The Ben Het was a MC40a light cruiser used by the Dimoks.

The Ben Het attacked the Victory I-class Star Destroyer Protector with Z-95 Headhunters while the Imperial ship was receiving the new TIE Avengers from the Ton-Falk-class escort carrier Tropsobor during the Sepan campaign. However, Ben Het was destroyed by TIE/sa bombers with help from Imperial Pilot Maarek Stele.
